    About Us

    Decades of Heritage, Commitment to Excellence

    Our Story

    With over 25 years of proven excellence, Venkateshwara CNC has earned the trust of homeowners, architects, and brands across Hyderabad and beyond. We blend traditional craftsmanship with precision CNC to deliver museum-grade wooden art and functional installations.

    Our journey has been one of constant evolution. What started with traditional hand tools has transformed into a state-of-the-art facility equipped with cutting-edge CNC machinery. Yet, at our core, we remain committed to the timeless principles that guided our founders—uncompromising quality, meticulous attention to detail, and deep respect for the natural beauty of wood.

    Our portfolio spans ornate temple doors, pillars, portraits, nameboards, decorative jali and grills, wall arts, furniture, and large-format ceiling installations. Every grain, curve, and finish reflects our obsession with quality and longevity.

    "Where tradition meets precision, and every grain tells a story."

    Our Values

    The principles that guide everything we do

    Passion for Craft

    Every piece we create is infused with dedication, artistry, and a deep respect for the timeless tradition of woodworking.

    Excellence

    We never compromise on quality. From material selection to final finishing, excellence is our standard.

    Client-Centric

    Your vision drives our work. We collaborate closely to ensure every detail matches your expectations.

    Innovation

    Blending traditional craftsmanship with modern CNC technology to push the boundaries of what's possible.

    Our Mission

    To create wooden masterpieces that transcend time—pieces that not only enhance spaces but become cherished heirlooms, passed down through generations. We believe that in an age of mass production, handcrafted artistry matters more than ever.

    Every cut, carve, and finish is executed with the understanding that we're not just working with wood—we're crafting legacy.

    Venkateshwara CNC

    Crafting Wooden Masterpieces Since 1995

    Where ancient wooden craftsmanship meets modern precision CNC technology, creating timeless artistry for your spaces.
